meanings.sent1: After the party, there was an overplus of cake left over.
meanings.sent2: The farmer had an overplus of apples this year.
meanings.sent3: The overplus of candy made the children very happy.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an overplus that brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The overplus of sunshine made the day feel magical.

meanings.definition: To exceed the proper or normal limit.
meanings.sent1: Try not to overplus your luggage weight limit at the airport.
meanings.sent2: The excitement overplused her ability to stay calm.
meanings.sent3: His enthusiasm for the project overplused all expectations.
meanings.sent4: The river overplused its banks after heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent5: The chef accidentally overplused the salt in the soup, making it too salty.
